items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – Razer’s desktop hologram from CES, Samsung Odyssey monitors up to 49% off, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. In this first 2026 edition of 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly, we’re highlighting a fresh batch of notable deals on gaming monitors, keyboards, and other essential peripherals, kicking off the new year with solid savings. There are also some compelling offers surfacing on Windows Copilot+ PCs, with several models dropping to new lows or matching their best prices to date. Whether you’re mapping out a full battlestation overhaul for the new year or eyeing a relatively simple upgrade to your current setup, this week’s roundup delivers plenty of deals worth a closer look. We’ll also briefly touch on a few standout gear that caught our eye at CES this year, including Razer’s Project AVA and even Anker’s 45W Nano charger with a smart display. All of that and more ready for you below.
